data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_3
data.value:
We work together with various service providers to create and run the App and provide the respective services. To the extent that we have bound these service providers to process data in line with strict instructions in their capacity as data processors on our behalf, any data processing activities undertaken by such providers shall not require your consent.
The service providers we have commissioned to create and run the App:
• Service providers for hosting services
• Service providers for programming services
• Service providers for hotline services and other App services
We only transmit your data to other recipients where necessary to fulfil a contract with you or between you and the third party, where we or the recipient has a legitimate interest in the disclosure of your data, or where you have given your consent to that transmission. These recipients include service providers and other companies within our corporate group. Furthermore, data may be transmitted to other recipients in the event that we are obliged to do so due to legal provisions or enforceable administrative or court orders.
Other recipients of your data are especially such service providers whose offers and services (third-party services) can be used in connection with the App or where the App enables access to such services.
Content, especially recipes, which you have created yourself, may also be transmitted to other BSH companies (also internationally) within the scope of technical processing and provision of the content/services. We base such transmission/processing on data protection agreements between the BSH companies involved, which also include the application of standard contractual clauses, insofar as the transmission includes a country outside the scope of the GDPR and if it’s not a case of Art. 45 GDPR.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_2
data.value:
We use the above-mentioned category of data
• to provide App features as well as the services offered via the App,
• for maintenance purposes, including the provision of related in-app/email messages (e.g. recommendations on the use of settings and/or maintenance programs) and reactive troubleshooting (e.g. in the context of remote diagnosis, during on-site repair),
• to improve the App's user friendliness and for specific or general troubleshooting of the App and the digital services offered through it.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_1
data.value:
In terms of App usage, BSH collects, processes and uses the following categories of personal data.
a. User data and usage data
We collect and use the following personal data regarding to you as user when setting up a user account (registration) as well as when setting up the App:
• When registering with login credentials submitted to you the relevant BSH affiliate or Service partner, we will store and process those credentials, which will identify you as user, authorized to use the App.
• Additional details that you may provide .The details requested as part of the App usage may differ from country to country and are managed (if available) via BSH centrally.
• Information which we collect and store during the registration process and/or while using the App: ‒ Device Platform, Device model, Device manufacturer, OS Version, Device Time Zone, Language, Memory utilization of your mobile device (at installation, in log-file), ‒ iService App Version, Storage utilization, last update of metadata database (in log-file), ‒ status of the user account (active, inactive – at logon), ‒ crash reports of the App (automatic transmission in case of a crash) ‒ logging of communication with backend (in log-file)
If the information described above is stored in a log-file, this information only is transmitted based on an additional user interaction (e.g. “send log-file)
b. Customer (Appliance) Data
In operating the App, there will be also Customer (Appliance) Data be loaded in the App or visible via the App. This Customer (Appliance) Data is also protected by Data Protection Laws and to be handled confidential and in a data protection compliant way only. If you have any questions in regard to Data Protection in regard to those data, please contact your BSH affiliate or Service Partner you work for.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_7
data.value:
a. Legal bases for intended data uses
We base the following data uses on
• the performance of a contract according article 6(1b) GDPR: ‒ Provision of App features as well as the services offered via the App by processing the data categories ‒ Bug fixing
b. Your rights
Your rights based on GDPR are outlined below. To exercise your rights, please use the contact information provided at the end of this data protection information.
• Your right to information about your data: We will provide you with information about the data we hold about you on request.
• Your right to correct and complete your data: We will correct inaccurate information about you if you notify us accordingly. We will complete incomplete data if you notify us accordingly, provided this data is necessary for the intended purpose of processing your data.
• Your right to delete your data: We will delete the information we hold about you on request. However, some data will only be deleted subject to a defined period of retention, for example because we are required to retain the data by law in some cases, or because we require the data to fulfil our contractual obligations to you. Please see also item 11.
• Your right to have your data blocked: In certain legally determined cases, we will block your data if you would like us to do so. Blocked data is only further processed to a very limited extent.
• Your right to withdraw consent: You can withdraw consent given for your data to be processed with effect for the future at any time. The legality of processing your data remains unaffected by this up to the point at which your consent is withdrawn. Please see also item 11.
• Your right to object to the processing of your data: You can object to the processing of your data with effect for the future at any time, if we are processing your data on the basis of one of the legal justifications set out in article 6(1e or 1f) GDPR. In the event that you object we will cease processing your data, provided that there are no compelling and legitimate grounds for further processing. The processing of your data for the purposes of direct marketing never constitutes compelling and legitimate grounds for us.
• Your right to data portability: At your request, we can make certain information available to you in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format.
• Your right to appeal to a regulatory authority: You can lodge an appeal pertaining to data protection with a data protection authority. To do so, contact the data protection authority responsible for your place of residence or the data protection authority under whose jurisdiction we fall (named below).
Bavarian Data Protection Authority (BayLDA), www.baylda.de.
c. Transmission to recipients outside the EEA
If necessary, for the provision of App features as well as the services offered via the App, we also transmit personal data to recipients based outside of the EEA, in so-called third countries. In this case, we ensure ‒ before any data is shared ‒ that either an appropriate level of data protection is maintained by the recipient (e.g. on the basis of an adequacy decision made by the EU Commission for the respective country or the agreement of standard EU contractual clauses between the European Union and the recipient) or that you have given your consent to said sharing.
We are happy to provide you with an overview of the recipients in third countries and a copy of the specific provisions agreed to ensure an appropriate level of data protection. To request this, please use the contact information provided at the end of this data protection information.
Please see item 9 for transmission of personal data by usage of third-party services.
d. Contact details of the data protection officer
If you have any questions relating to data protection or exercising your rights, you can use the following contact information to get in touch with our data protection officer directly:
BSH Hausgeräte GmbH Data Protection Officer Carl-Wery-Str. 34 81739 Munich, Germany
Data-Protection@bshg.com
Date of issue: December 2020

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_6
data.value: As the App and the services provided via the App continues to undergo development – among other things, through the implementation of new technologies or the introduction of new services – this data protection information may need to be adjusted accordingly. iService5 shall reserve the right to amend or supplement this information as required. iService5 will always update the data protection information in the App; you can therefore familiarise yourself with the latest version at any time.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_5
data.value: We deploy technical and organisational measures to protect your data, for example, from manipulation, loss and unauthorised third-party access. These measures include the use of encoding technologies, certificates, firewalls on the servers and password protection in the App. We are constantly reviewing and improving our security measures in accordance with technological advancement.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA_4
data.value: We use Visual Studio App Center (https://appcenter.ms) to collect and send anonymous error reports if the App behaves in an unexpected way, especially if the App crashes.

data.value: Connection to bridge not possible. Your iService bridge might not be in iService5 mode and/or local networks usage permission is denied. Please go to iService4 administrator console and activate bridge and/or give local networks usage permission.

data.name: SERVER_CERTIFICATE_EXPIRED
data.value: A certificate has expired. You can proceed using iService5. We will launch a new iService5 version soon to fix this issue.

data.name: DATA_PRIVACY_POLICY_DATA
data.value:
The BSH Hausgeräte GmbH, with its registered office at Carl-Wery-Strasse 34, 81739 Munich, Germany (hereinafter "BSH" or "we") is responsible for the collection, processing and use of your personal data associated with the iService5 app (hereinafter "App"). BSH provides the App as a central service, even if the company you (as the App user) work for is a BSH affiliate or Service Partner. The App is for business use only and not intended for any private use.
BSH collects, processes and uses personal data, which is either entered by you or otherwise created and processed in the course of using the App, in accordance with the applicable data privacy laws. The following information explains how we handle such data provided in using the App.

data.name: INCORRECT_CREDENTIALS
data.value: Your credentials are incorrect. Please check username and password. Password must be case sensitive.

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_ALL_VERSIONS
data.value: All Firmware versions will be installed

data.name: IMPRINT_DATA_1
data.value: BSH Hausgeräte GmbH Carl-Wery-Str. 34 81739 Munich Germany

data.value: Unless otherwise specified, all trademarks in this app are protected by proprietary rights. This applies in particular to BSH brands, nameplates, corporate logos and emblems. BSH is a trademark licensee of Robert Bosch GmbH for the Bosch brand and Siemens AG for the Siemens brand.

data.name: CONN_PAGE_CHOOSE_BSH_NET
data.value: of your mobile device and choose the network starting with "BSH...".

data.name: CONN_PAGE_DBUS_DISCONNECTED
data.value: DBus not yet available. Checking connection...

data.name: BOOT_MODE_TRANSITION_APPLIANCE_RECONNECT_AFTERWARDS
data.value: WiFi hotspot of appliance will be deactivated. If necessary, you can reconnect afterwards.

data.name: FEEDBACK_PAGE_GOONLINE
data.value: Your feedback will be sent as soon as you are connected to the internet.

data.name: APPLIANCE_INSTALL_REPAIR_POPUP_CLOSING
data.value: Automatically closing popup in order to successfully continue process

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_QUERY_OLD
data.value: Available firmware is out of date. Please download latest files.

data.name: BOOT_MODE_TRANSITION_APPLIANCE_ADDITIONAL_REBOOTING
data.value: Recovery System has been updated. A reboot is necessary.

data.name: CODING_TRANSITION
data.value: Waiting for Coding state to initialise

data.name: SSH_COMMAND_ERROR
data.value: Connection to bridge not possible. Your iService bridge might not be in iService5 mode. Please go to iService4 administrator console and activate bridge.

data.name: ENUMBER_MISMATCH
data.value: The entered E-number differs from the one stored in the appliance

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_CODING_AFTER_FLASH_WRONG
data.value: Coding activation response was not valid.

data.name: MONITORING_PARSING_ERROR
data.value: Not able to show Monitoring. Please contact support.

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_PURGE
data.value: Delete all data and settings? (Home Connect data and serial number will be deleted. Re-Pairing will be required.)

data.name: BOOT_MODE_TRANSITION_APPLIANCE_IS_REBOOTING_TO_ELP
data.value: Appliance is rebooting back to Normal System.

data.name: NEED_ACCOUNT_PAGE_DETAILS_LABEL
data.value:
iService5 is a mobile application to support service technicians during the repair of BSH home appliances by providing failure diagnosis and software updates.
Login data for iService5 are the same you may already use for iService3, iService4 or Quickfinder. If you don’t have this information, please contact your local BSH iService support.

data.name: BRIDGE_SETTINGS_INTEGER_HELP
data.value: Value should be a number with max value {0}

data.name: HA_INFO_RETRY_MESSAGE_MOBILE_DATA_ENABLED
data.value: iService could not receive data from home appliance. Please make sure the mobile data connection is disabled and try again.

data.name: CONN_PAGE_FLASHING_DISABLED_NOTSMM
data.value: Program disabled. This is not a SystemMaster appliance with WiFi.

data.name: SCHEMA_CHANGE_TEXT
data.value: Please wait while updating schema changes...

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_PREPERATION_FAILED
data.value: Something went wrong. Please contact support or try again.

data.name: METADATA_DOWNLOAD_UPDATE_PERMISSION_TEXT
data.value: In order to search for the latest appliances and download related appliance files, we recommend to update your appliance list (100 MB).

data.name: INSTALL_REPAIR_ECU
data.value: ECU Firmware is being installed right now. Wait and don't interrupt power supply until this process is finished. This may take up to 30 min.

data.name: LOGIN_PAGE_LOGIN_FAILURE_INDICATION_LOCAL
data.value: Your login data is incorrect. Please check your entered information.

data.name: CONN_PAGE_ENTER_WIFI_PASS
data.value: Enter WiFi password of home appliance.

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_ONLY_NEW
data.value: New FW versions will be installed

data.name: DELETE_APPLIANCE_FILES_WARNIG_TEXT
data.value: Clicking button below will delete all downloaded appliance files (binaries) on your device. Please note: A new download may require some time and internet connnection.

data.name: LOCATION_ENABLE_ALERT
data.value: Turn on Location Services to allow iService5 to determine the connected WiFi network

data.name: CONN_PAGE_MODE_CHANGE_DISABLED_SMM_CONN_DEVICE_NOT_COMPLETE
data.value: Mode Switch disabled. Communication with appliance is not complete.

data.name: GRAPHIC_PAGE_CONNECT_TEXT
data.value: Turn on the WiFi hotspot of the appliance.

data.name: SYMANA_PENDING_INSTALLATIONS_ARE_FINISHED
data.value: Pending installations are being finished first..

data.name: ST_PAGE_DWL_NO
data.value: Appliance files are up to date

data.name: SYMANA_BINARY_UPLOAD_SUCCESS
data.value: All modules have been successfully uploaded

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_ONLY_OPTIONAL
data.value: Only optional FW versions to upgrade

data.name: NO_LOCAL_CREDENTIALS
data.value: Please connect your smart device to the internet. This is necessary to verify your user credentials.

data.name: PE_CHECK_FAILED_WARNING_MESSAGE
data.value: PE of power socket is conducting voltage. Unplug the Appliance-Tester! Don't use this power socket anymore! Inform the customer

data.name: APPLIANCE_FLASH_FAILED_TO_GET_BOOTMODE
data.value: Failed to retrieve bootmode or bootmode was invalid.

data.name: CONN_PAGE_MEASURE_AND_BRIDGE_SETTING_DISABLED
data.value: Measure and Bridge Settings disabled as connection to bridge not possible.

data.name: STATUS_PAGE_GOONLINE
data.value: Please go online to update your appliance list.
